title: MC_TA_REF (Struct)
text:
TYPE MC_TA_REF : STRUCT
This
STRUCT
describes a trajectory that can later be executed by
MC_AccelerationProfile
.

rows.Name: Number_of_pairs
rows.Comment:
This variable is not used and only present for compatibility reasons.
Please useMC_AccelerationProfile.``ArraySize`` instead.

rows.Name: IsAbsolute
rows.Comment:
TRUE: Accelerations values are interpreted absolute (not
relative).
